Retro Candy from the Imagination Room

Give your customers a "Giant" taste of pure deliciousness with Pixy Stix Giant Candy! Retro candy doesn't get any better than this!
These giant straws are filled entirely with the yummiest powder candy ever! Coming in the awesome flavours of Grape, Maui Punch, Cherry, and Orange. 
Pixy Stix Giant Candies are inspired by the amusing sweetness of Willy Wonka himself! Be sweet just like Wonka and, stock your retro candy section with Pixy Stix Giant Candy!

  • Nut-free, gluten-free, dairy-free; no fat or sodium
  • Tangy, uniquely fun candy that charges your taste buds
